game.name: Shadows and Lies
game.categories: Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Join Eldan and Dathan as they set off on a tricky mission which immediately hits disaster. Threats build up around them from the ominous Zerrlan sect. Can they find help on their way from the good Virtran monks? And more importantly, can they help you find Dathan's vanished sisters?
